introsdg: Let's join together to make the world more beautiful!
title: What is SDGs?
body: The Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) are a set of 17 goals that 193 United NationsÂ member countries have agreed to work together to achieve by 2030 in order to solve problems and create sustainable development in the areas of poverty, hunger, the economy, global resources, and international cooperation.
note: More information about each topic's goals can be discovered at
